Description: Heart scarab: a debased form of the traditional heart scarab. The body is of oval shape with both sides flat; it is pierced horizontally at the top. Shortly below the piercing are two small lugs. The amulet was moulded in opaque millefiori glass of a black or brown body throughout which are strewn numerous threads, 'eyes' and other shapes in opaque yellow and brownish red. Perforated. Matt surface. Copper alloy loop for suspension.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
